name: morel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a pointed edible fungus (= one that can be eaten) with an uneven surface: You may sometimes find morels - highly prized, edible, springtime mushrooms - growing around the trees.
Dan Thornberg/EyeEm/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesI feasted on roast pigeon and morel mushrooms.Morels can grow wild in most of the USA.Hunting morels is a great excuse to get outdoors during a nice time of year. Ideal growing conditions could bring 50,000 morel hunters into forests across the West.
